alert.note: Alert for Inland Georgetown; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry and south central Marion Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 701 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Myrtle Beach across Bucksville to Dongola, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 35 and 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway, Red Hill, Socastee, Hickory Grove, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Bucksville, Nixonville, Bucksport, Dongola, Forestbrook, Hammond, Yauhannah, Coastal Carolina University, Lighthouse Care Center Of Conway and Conway Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 15. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 16 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
